name: Solar System: mini simulation
description:
Have fun with discovering the solar system planets histories and origins! all info here are from the official National Geographic channel on Youtube. 

How to play:

  • Use arrows or WASD to move & press "shift" while moving to move faster
  • Click on the sun or any planet on the system to hear some good information from National Geographic | 101 planets series!
  • have fun!  

Disclaimer:

  • This project is not commercial and just for fun. 
  • Non of the sounds here mine.
  • all the arts are from different sites on the web and I am so tired to write them down now ^^
